item.description:
We decided to return to Tokyo this month.

The October sushi meetup falls immediately after the Jewish holiday of Yom Kippur, which is a complete fast day for the observant. Although neither of us are observant Jews -- after all, sushi is not generally kosher -- we felt that it would be best to hold this meetup at a place we trust to be able to handle things well with a minimum of effort on our part.

group.name: The Rhode Island Sushi Meetup Group

item.name: Sushi meetup: Tokyo Restaurant, Oct 13, 7:00pm
